title: Doubling Down
description: The Hawthorne sisters are incredibly talented and beautiful girls who live next to twin boys who drive them crazy playing loud music and disturbing what the girls had hoped would be a quiet summer. An offhand comment leads to a bet of epic proportions. With two months, for two girls, to feminize two boys, which sister will come out on top? Will the guys be able to walk the runway at an end of summer fashion showcase without giving away their true gender and will they ever be the same?This 8,000 word story contains forced feminization, bondage, humiliation, and female domination.
author: Kylie Gable
